products.title: Apples
products.description: Apples are high in fiber, vitamin C, and various antioxidants.

products.title: Carrots
products.description: Carrots are a particularly good source of beta carotene, fiber, vitamin K1, potassium, and antioxidants

products.title: Chicken Breast
products.description: Chicken breast is a great source of lean protein (protein without a lot of accompanying fat).

products.title: White Rice
products.description: White rice is a source of carbohydrates, it also has 4 to 5 grams of protein in one serving and almost no fat.

products.title: Eggs
products.description: Eggs are a natural source of many nutrients including high quality protein, vitamins and minerals.
